sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-form-item :label="label" :style="`font-size: ${fontSize}`">
    <el-input :maxlength="maxlength" v-model="value" size="large"></el-input>
  </el-form-item>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "TextField",
  emits: ["update:modelValue"],
  props: {
    label: String,
    fontSize: { type: String, default: 'var(--el-form-label-font-size)'},
    maxlength: {
      type: Number,
      default: 200,
    },
    modelValue: String,
  },
  computed: {
    value: {
      get() {
        return this.modelValue;
      },
      set(value) {
        this.$emit("update:modelValue", value);
      },
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.el-form-item__label{
  font-size: inherit;
}
</style>
